titleStmt.title: The vindication of Slingsby Bethel Esq., one of the sheriffs of London and Middlesex against the several slanders cast upon him upon the occasion of his being proposed for one of the burgesses to serve in the late Parliament : for the burrough of Southwark.
titleStmt.author: Bethel, Slingsby, 1617-1697.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Slingsby Bethel. Cf. BLC.
Reproduction of originals in Huntington Library.
Entry for V492 cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.).
